description: ff. 187. 215 x 160; 170 x 100 mm. 23 lin. Ṣafar 1180. on ṭahārah-ḥudūd; the glossator did not complete his work, cf. Murādī, Silk al-durar, IV, 66. Incip.: ... قوله بغىر طهور ضبط بفتح الطا وضمها وبالفتح قىل اسم للاله فقط
author: Sindī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Hādī, d. 1726
title: ḥawāshin ʻalá Sunan al-Tirmidhī.
creator: Sindī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Hādī, d. 1726
subject: Tirmidhī, Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá, d. 892—Jāmiʻ al-kabīr.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
